name: PollutionCity
description:
Hello! First time showing up game😊

It's our school team project.

This game is strategy turn-based game like civilization.

Our concept is about Pollution  and you can play it on free.

You can control by mouse click.

There is 3unit. ( Explorer, Researcher, Manufacturer )

Each Unit can move one time in each turn.

The game of the goal is winning by lowering pollution levels.

Korean is the only language we are currently offering😥

Enjoy!
